name: Experiencing ancient Cham Culture
description: Champa started as a kingdom long time ago in the central area nowadays (192AD - 1832), and still preserves its beautiful and unique culture and tradition till present day. Renowned with grand festivals and gorgeous brick Hindu temples while the technology they were built with is still a mystery. Being in this one day tour, you will surely enjoy the famous sites as well as cutural experience activities being introduced by a local.
